document.full_text: china's sina corp is readying an english version of its microblogging platform, weibo, and plans to launch it in the u.s. in two-three months as a rival to twitter, chinese tech blog techweb said, citing informed sources.
document.title: sina plans u.s. launch of weibo as twitter rival: techweb
lines_and_colors: china's sina corp is readying an english version of its microblogging platform, weibo, and plans to launch it in the u.s. in two-three months as a rival to twitter, chinese tech blog techweb said, citing informed sources.
